scripts.postinstall: npm run faults-api:install && npm run households-api:install && cd starter-ui && npm i
scripts.faults-api:generate: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-angular --type-mappings AnyType=any --additional-properties=serviceSuffix=RestClient,npmName=@c4-soft/faults-api,stringEnums=true,enumPropertyNaming=camelCase --remove-operation-id-prefix -i ../faults-openapi.json -o libs/c4-soft/faults-api
scripts.faults-api:build: npm run faults-api:generate && npm run ng -- build @c4-soft/faults-api --configuration production
scripts.faults-api:install: cd libs/c4-soft/faults-api && npm i && cd ../../.. && npm run faults-api:build
scripts.households-api:generate: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-angular --type-mappings AnyType=any --additional-properties=serviceSuffix=RestClient,npmName=@c4-soft/households-api,stringEnums=true,enumPropertyNaming=camelCase --remove-operation-id-prefix -i ../households-openapi.json -o libs/c4-soft/households-api
scripts.households-api:build: npm run households-api:generate && npm run ng -- build @c4-soft/households-api --configuration production
scripts.households-api:install: cd libs/c4-soft/households-api && npm i && cd ../../.. && npm run households-api:build
